name: Taioridaikorde
description:
This game was made on Unity for the GMTK Jam 2021: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021/rate/1085403

Taioridaikorde

Try to survive as long as possible by dodging and shooting planets bonding together.

The goal is to survive as much as possible.

You can upgrade your ship to last longer. Just use the button in the top left of the screen.

 The enemies are invulnerable while linked with anything else, so break the bond first! Be careful not to overheat when firing; the Damage upgrade improve greatly your weapons commands : 

  • Aim your ship with the mouse cursor 
  • Space: Accelerate Left-Click

Good luck!
